page.title: 09MY SUNDAYS - LEAH GROWCOTT
page.content:
On Sundays we get up early and go to Pagham Parish Church. Afterwards we have a cooked breakfast and then we go walking or swimming. We go walking at Bignor or swimming at Birdham. I like the drive to Birdham, especially the duck pond which we pass.
When we get to the club we show our membership cards. There is a swimming pool, squash courts, tennis courts, pub and children's room. The club is called 'The Roman Way' and it takes twenty minutes to get there from Pagham.
We have a late lunch, then we go and visit my grandparents who live in Aldwick. When we come home, we watch television until it's time for bed.
